main event: USAF pilots reported a sighting of an unidentified flying object trailing intense green and blue flames.
interesting points: The sighting occurred at 1926 PST,The object was descending at a high speed from an altitude of 13,000 feet,The object slowed down as it approached the ground,Only one object was observed during the sighting,The sighting lasted for approximately 2 seconds.
sighted object: unidentified flying object with intense green and blue flames
